content: **sizes ** * 0 - 6 months * 6 - 12 months > buy 3 patterns or more and get 20% off > on the entire purchase no coupon is > needed happy crocheting **materials ** yarn aran weight yarn - yarn and colors - old pink 47 50 g 1 75 oz and 75 m 82 yds crochet hook 4 0 mm crochet hook or the size needed to obtain the gauge you will also need 2 stitch markers a tapestry needle scissors **stitches ** chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet front and back post double_crochet stitches fpdc and bpdc **number of pages in pdf ** 3 **in the pdf ** written instructions step-by-step photos and video tutorials **language ** english **crochet terms ** us crochet terms **skill level ** easy| medium **please note ** this pattern can be found with ads on my blog croby patterns and video tutorial on my youtube channel my blog crobypatterns com youtube http //bit ly/crobypatternsyt the price is for the pattern/tutorial/pdf only not the finished product **returns** please contact me if you have any questions before you make a purchase as i am selling pdf files you can t fully return them or exchange them so there are no refunds on digital files all rights reserved © 2019 croby patterns
